room_title: Escape room "Mad Lab" by Escape This Live in Frederick
review: A fun entry level room. Good aesthetics. Attentive and good staff, and you can tell that they enjoy what they do. Countdown clock in the room. Some clever science themed puzzles.

room_title: Escape room "Mad Lab" by Escape This Live in Frederick
review: The Mad Science lab was awesome! Challenging, varied, and full of surprises! We had a crazy fun time and felt like heroes when we defused the bomb! Holy cow, what a thrill. Amazing owner, exceptional service, and beautifully done professional atmosphere!

room_title: Escape room "Mad Lab" by Escape This Live in Frederick
review: So much fun! Really high-quality rooms. We did the Lab and it was really challenging and that math problem was killer! I have been to several escape rooms in different states and this was one of the best! The effects and props were excellent! I am super bummed we didn’t “escape” so we will be back to try another room and redeem ourselves!

room_title: Escape room "Mad Lab" by Escape This Live in Frederick
review: Super fun time escaping the Mad Lab. Will definitely go again.
